long_description: Charge 2 GoPro lithium ion batteries simultaneously with the GoPro Dual Battery Charger. It works with most standard USB chargers, the GoPro wall charger or auto charger (sold separately). Dual LED indicator lights display the charging status of both batteries: in process (amber) and fully charged (green).
short_description: Charge 2 GoPro lithium ion batteries simultaneously with the GoPro Dual Battery Charger. It works with most standard USB chargers, the GoPro wall charger or auto charger (sold separately).
